snippet: Bill Hamilton, the former companion of Steve Rubell, a co-founder of Studio 54, will auction items from that famous disco.
abstract: Bill Hamilton, former companion of New York night life impresario and Studio 54 co-founder Steve Rubell, will auction artwork and other items Rubell possessed until his death in 1989; collection consists mainly of memorabilia associated with the famous disco.
lead_paragraph: Bill Hamilton, the former companion of Steve Rubell, a co-founder of Studio 54, will auction items from that famous disco.

headline.seo: Studio 54 Memorabilia to Be Sold at Auction
headline.main: Selling Some Old Sparkle From Nights at Studio 54
headline.print_headline: Selling Some Old Sparkle From Nights at Studio 54
